resources.string: PLEASE DRINK WITH CAUTION AND VERIFY YOU ARE OVER 21 YEARS OLD. BY ACCEPTING OUR DISCLAIMER YOU ACKNOWLEDGE YOU ARE 21 AND WILL DRINK WITH CAUTION AND WITHIN THE LIMITATIONS OF YOUR REGION.

"Your team scores = sing Scorpions' 'Rock You Like A Hurricane' and drain your drink
\nYour team gets scored on = sing Nine Inch Nails' 'Head Like A Hole' and take a sip
\nYour team gets scored on again = sing Lenny Kravitz's 'It Ain't Over Till It's Over' and have a shot
\nYour team gets scored on AGAIN = sing Smokey Robinson's 'Tears of a Clown' and drain somebody else's drink
\nWTF? Your team takes a 4th one = no more alcohol for you until the end of the game. Start drinking water before things get ugly.
\n

2-minute minor = 2 sips
\n4-minute minor = 4 sips
\n5-minute major = 5 sips plus a shot
\n10-minute misconduct = drain your drink plus 2 shots
\nGame misconduct = go outside and pour your drink over your head (pour water if you're lily-livered)
\nGloves & helmets come off and players square off = drain your drink and hide behind an item of furniture until it's over (yeah, seriously)
\nRef or linesman falls over = sing AC\/DC's 'Thunderstruck' and drain your drink
\nGoaltender scores
